columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the location. The Location Package Reference Unit Capacity capabilities are used to define the transport handling unit capacity for a location and location role combination.

columns.name: LOCATION_ROLE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the location role.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_HANDLING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the transport handling unit.

columns.name: PACKAGING_REFERENCE_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the package unit reference unit.

columns.name: TOTAL_PRU_COUNT
columns.description: Enter a Limit Packaging Reference Unit Count. This represents the number of package references units that can fill the usable space in the location. The area of a location may suggest more packaging reference units can fit, but due to the actual dimensions of the packaged reference units, a lower limit may be reached.

columns.name: LIMIT_PRU_COUNT
columns.description: Enter a Total Packaging Reference Unit Count. This total represents by volume the amount of packaging reference units that can fill the space. It does not take into account the actual shape and dimensions of the packaging reference unit, but rather how many packaging reference units can fit in the space based on the volume of each packaging reference unit.
